${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:HomingAttack.NAME: Homing Attack
${modID}:HomingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Height and a Trick to your hand.

${modID}:GainedHeight.NAME: Gained Height
${modID}:GainedHeight.DESCRIPTION: Reduces to zero at end of turn. Play a Height Finisher at end of turn.

${modID}:Height.NAME: Height
${modID}:Height.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Autoplays all Heights and Tricks in your hand. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played, auto plays all Heights and Trick in your hand.
At the end of your turn, play a finisher card for all of your height.

${modID}:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
${modID}:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: You draw one less card next turn. Gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:AMAZING.NAME: AMAZING
${modID}:AMAZING.DESCRIPTION: If you play three attacks in a single turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:AncientLight.NAME: Ancient Light
${modID}:AncientLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Trick played.

${modID}:Athleticism.NAME: Athleticism
${modID}:Athleticism.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to two cards. NL Your debuffs decrease by one.

${modID}:BackSpinKick.NAME: Back Spin Kick
${modID}:BackSpinKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This deals !M! additional damage for each orb you have.

${modID}:BlueBlur.NAME: Blue Blur
${modID}:BlueBlur.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:BlueTornado.NAME: Blue Tornado
${modID}:BlueTornado.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Height to your hand.

${modID}:BouncePad.NAME: Bounce Pad
${modID}:BouncePad.DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Block. NL Add !M! Heights to your hand.

${modID}:Crouch.NAME: Crouch
${modID}:Crouch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand.

${modID}:DashPanel.NAME: Dash Panel
${modID}:DashPanel.DESCRIPTION: Play the two cards to the right of this card.

${modID}:DirectJump.NAME: Direct Jump
${modID}:DirectJump.DESCRIPTION: When you gain Block this turn, add a Height to your hand.

${modID}:Drift.NAME: Drift
${modID}:Drift.DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effects of your orbs X times.

${modID}:EndlessBoost.NAME: Endless Boost
${modID}:EndlessBoost.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Every turn, gain 1 [E].

${modID}:FireTackle.NAME: Fire Tackle
${modID}:FireTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal 10 damage. NL When you are attacked this turn, deal 3 damage to the attacker.

${modID}:FlagPole.NAME: Flag Pole
${modID}:FlagPole.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each Height in your hand.

${modID}:HeavyBounceSlam.NAME: Heavy Bounce Slam
${modID}:HeavyBounceSlam.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all of your frost orbs. NL Deal 2x damage for each frost orb evoked.

${modID}:HomingDash.NAME: Homing Dash
${modID}:HomingDash.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played twice.
${modID}:HomingDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played twice.

${modID}:MyRainbow.NAME: My Rainbow
${modID}:MyRainbow.DESCRIPTION: Play the top 3 cards of your draw pile.

${modID}:Pose.NAME: Pose
${modID}:Pose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is in your hand, the last AUTOPLAY trick gets played twice.

${modID}:PowerRing.NAME: Power Ring
${modID}:PowerRing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you create a card, create one more.

${modID}:RampJump.NAME: Ramp Jump
${modID}:RampJump.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 2 Tricks to your hand.

${modID}:ScissorKick.NAME: Scissor Kick
${modID}:ScissorKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 3 damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:SecretRoute.NAME: Secret Route
${modID}:SecretRoute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you create or draw a card, upgrade it. NL Draw 3 cards.

${modID}:Slide.NAME: Slide
${modID}:Slide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 block. NL If you created a card this turn, gain 1 [E] and draw 1 Card.

${modID}:SonicFlare.NAME: Sonic Flare
${modID}:SonicFlare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to ALL enemies. NL Add a trick to your hand.
${modID}:SonicFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile. NL It is upgraded for the rest of combat.

${modID}:SonicIsMyName.NAME: Sonic Is My Name
${modID}:SonicIsMyName.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play an attack card, activate the passive of effect of ALL your orbs.

${modID}:SpeedUp.NAME: Speed Up
${modID}:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals 8 additional damage. NL Gain 1 [E].

${modID}:SpinDash.NAME: Spin Dash
${modID}:SpinDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile.
${modID}:SpinDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile. NL It is upgraded for the rest of combat.

${modID}:UpDraft.NAME: Up Draft
${modID}:UpDraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add a Height to your hand.

${modID}:WallJump.NAME: Wall Jump
${modID}:WallJump.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and add Height to your hand X times.

${modID}:DevCreateCard.NAME: Dev Create Card
${modID}:DevCreateCard.DESCRIPTION: Heal target for 999 HP. NL Lose 99 [E]. NL Gain 3 [E]. NL Add any card to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This is not a card intended for players.
